resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107906</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107906</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211451</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Origin of Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung von Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Origine de Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Origem de Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Origine di Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προέλευση Glaciation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Origen de Glaciation</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site provides animations useful for teaching about global cooling and the way glaciation originates. Visualizations illustrate and explain the effects of Milankovitch Cycles and fluctuations in atmospheric carbon dioxide leading to "Snowball Earth" conditions. Resources may be incorporated into lectures, labs, or other activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site stellt die Animationen zur Verfügung, 
die für das Unterrichten über das globale Abkühlen nützlich sind 
und das Methode glaciation entsteht. Sichtbarmachungen 
veranschaulichen und erklären die Effekte der Milankovitch Schleifen 
und der Fluktuationen im atmosphärischen Kohlendioxyd, das zu 
"Snowball Masse" Zustände führt. Betriebsmittel können in 
Vorträge, in Labors oder in andere Aktivitäten enthalten werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site fournit des animations utiles pour 
enseigner au sujet du refroidissement global et le glaciation de voie 
commence. Les visualisations illustrent et expliquent les effets
des cycles et des fluctuations de Milankovitch en anhydride carbonique
atmosphérique menant aux états "de la terre de Snowball". 
Des ressources peuvent être incorporées aux conférences, aux 
laboratoires, ou à d'autres activités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local fornece os animations úteis ensinando 
sobre refrigerar global e o glaciation da maneira origina. Os 
visualizations ilustram e explicam os efeitos de ciclos e de 
flutuações de Milankovitch no dióxido de carbono atmosférico que 
conduz de "às condições da terra Snowball". Os recursos podem
ser incorporados em lectures, em laboratórios, ou em outras 
atividades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo fornisce le animazioni utili per 
l'istruzione circa il raffreddamento globale ed il glaciation di modo 
inizia. Le visualizzazioni illustrano e spiegano gli effetti dei
cicli e delle fluttuazioni di Milankovitch in anidride carbonica 
atmosferica che conduce "agli stati della terra di Snowball". Le
risorse possono essere comprese nelle conferenze, nei laboratori, o in
altre attività.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή παρέχει τις ζωτικότητες χρήσιμες για 
για τη σφαιρική ψύξη και τον τρόπο που το glaciation 
δημιουργείται. Οι απεικονίσεις επεξηγούν και εξηγούν τα 
αποτελέσματα των κύκλων Milankovitch και των διακυμάνσεων στο 
ατμοσφαιρικό διοξείδιο του άνθρακα που οδηγεί στους γήινους 
"όρουσ" χιονιών. Τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς μπορούν να 
ενσωματωθούν στις διαλέξεις, τα εργαστήρια, ή άλλες 
δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio proporciona a las animaciones útiles 
para enseñar sobre refrescarse global y el glaciation de la manera 
origina. Las visualizaciones ilustran y explican los efectos de 
los ciclos y de las fluctuaciones de Milankovitch en el bióxido de 
carbono atmosférico que conduce "a las condiciones de la tierra de 
Snowball". Los recursos se pueden incorporar en conferencias, 
laboratorios, u otras actividades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211451</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107906</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/origin-of-glaciation</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
